section1.greeting: My name is Mesut, I am a Software Enginner
section1.bio: I am a Computer Science student at Texas State University pursuing Mathematics as my minor. Main focus of my major is Software Engineering. Through out my experience in Texas State University I have put together complex projects as well as meeting incredible mentors. If I am not behind my computer coding or stressing over an assignment, I enjoy attending fun activities. Floating down the San Marcos river every once in a while is one of the best ways to relieve stress.
